conbody.p: The IPConfig section is related to the LCM framework and is used for configuring IP settings for VNFs and various VM types. For more information on the IPConfig section, see the VNF Artifacts Generator Tool Guide.
conbody.note: The entire IPCONFIG section and the parameters comprised in it are automatically created when the VNF Extension file is generated. This section does not exist in the sample VNF Extension files available for the NCC release. Do not remove or manually modify the generated parameters. Any changes needed for the IPConfig section must be made as documented in the VNF Artifacts Generator Tool Guide.
